full_summary:
**Floating Dock Construction**

**Reference Number:** cb-671-11476473
**Amendment Number:** 5

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)
**Publication Date:** 2023-10-30
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-14T14:00:00

**Contract Description:**
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the construction of a floating dock in Pugwash, Cumberland County, Nova Scotia. The scope of work includes the removal and reinstatement of existing armour stone and core stone berm material, dredging of the harbour bottom, supply and install new floating docks, strongarms and gangways, and continuous concrete retaining wall.

**Conditional Set-Aside:**
This tender is conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). If two or more bids are received from Indigenous businesses who are certified under the PSIB criteria and listed in the Indigenous Business Directory, the contracting authority will limit the competition to those Indigenous businesses.

**Tender Requirements:**
- The successful bidder must be able to meet the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal documentation.
- Bidder must also provide certification under the Indigenous Business Directory.
- Bidders must be able to meet the deadlines outlined in the tender package.

**Attachments:**
Tender Notice, Attachments and amendments are available on the CanadaBuy website by searching for Tender Notice Reference: cb-671-11476473.

**Contact Information:**
For any questions regarding this tender or the Request for Proposal documentation, please contact Dina Al-Eryani via email [Dina.Al-Eryani@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Dina.Al-Eryani@dfo-mpo.gc.ca) or by phone 506282-2340.

Thank you for your professionalism in working with me! 

This is final. Next entry, please.
